Package com.company

Class LawnMower

java.lang.Object
com.company.Elements
com.company.Character
com.company.LawnMower
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LawnMower
extends Character
implements java.io.Serializable
This is Lawn Mower class in this class we hold the information related to Lawn mower when the zombies arrive to home for the first time the lawn mover kills them
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahdi Rhamani

  • Constructor Details

    • LawnMower

      public LawnMower​(int[] position, GameState gameState)
      This is constructor of this class It calls the constructor of superclass and pass the needed argument as an entry If we call this create a new Character class the speed of lawn mower first must be 0 . after the arriving of first zombie must be changed Then the speed of lawn mower is -10(because go to the left of the yard)
      Parameters:
      position - the x&y coordinates
      gameState - the game state

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      This is an overridden method of element class when the lawn mower impacts to the zombies in a row must kill them so for this purpose we call hurt method and change the Hp
      Overrides:
      update in class Character
